pages.title: Shimmerstone Lights
pages.text: On your first nights in this new world, you lit your improvised hut with torches. As atmospheric as that was, it was also primitive.$(br)To move away from your dark, torch-lit past, you created lamps based on Shimmerstone.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: There are various variants, depending on what polished block you use as a base.

pages.title: Blackslag Variant
pages.text: Blackslag can be used, too, resulting in an especially dark variant.
